xqdoc:module.xqdoc:name: xqdoc-proj.xqm

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Generate XQuery documentation in html using file:///C:/Users/andy/workspace/app-doc/src/doc/data/doc/models $efolder:="file:///C:/Users/andy/workspace/app-doc/src/doc/data/doc/models" $target:="file:///C:/Users/andy/workspace/app-doc/src/doc/generated/models.xqm"
save documentation for files to target

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:save-xq
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:save-xq($files as item()*, $target as item()*, $params as map(*)) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: save xqdoc and html for source file $f

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:gendoc
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:gendoc($f as element(c:file), $op as xs:string, $target as xs:string, $params as map(*)) as item()*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:read
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:read($efolder as xs:string) as map(*)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:imports
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:imports($doc as item()*) as (map(*))*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: save xqdoc and html for source file $f

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:gendoc2
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:gendoc2($f as element(c:file), $op as xs:string, $target as xs:string, $params as map(*)) as (map(*))*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: save $data to $url , create fdolder if missing)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:store
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:store($data as item()*, $url as xs:string, $params as map(*)) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: return intent to save $data to $url with serialization $params

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:store2
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:store2($data as item()*, $url as xs:string, $params as map(*)) as item()*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:parse
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:parse($xq as xs:string) as element()

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:xqdoc
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:xqdoc($url as xs:string, $opts as map(*)) as element(xqdoc:xqdoc)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:xqdoc-html
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:xqdoc-html($xqd as element(xqdoc:xqdoc), $params as map(*)) as document-node()

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:index-html
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:index-html($files as item()*, $params as map(*)) as document-node()

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:export-resources
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:export-resources($target as xs:string) as empty-sequence()

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:export-resources2
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %updating function xqd:export-resources2($target as xs:string) as empty-sequence()

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: return sequence of maps with maps uri and methods

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:rxq-paths
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:rxq-paths($state as item()*) as (map(*))*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:annots-rxq
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:annots-rxq($state as map(*)) as (map(*))*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: return all matching annotations in xqdoc

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:annotations
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:annotations($xqdoc as element(xqdoc:xqdoc), $annotns as xs:string, $aname as xs:string) as element(xqdoc:annotation)*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: return annotations with namespace and name

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:methods
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:methods($annots as element(xqdoc:annotations), $annotns as xs:string, $aname as xs:string) as element(xqdoc:annotation)*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:annotation-map
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:annotation-map($xqdoc as item()*) as item()*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xqd:annots
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function xqd:annots($annots as element(xqdoc:annotation)*, $ns as map(*)) as map(*)
